title: ONE FOR ALL challenge: Rioters VS Players. Friday 16/9 @6PM PST.
body:
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/132/663/1307737417001.jpg

..and all for one! Here we go. One For All match to end all matches. RGM team Rioters VS Players.

And I swear.. ..if my team trolls me with 5 Bards... -_-

**Who:** RGM team Rioters VS players
**When:** Friday 16/9 @6PM PST.
**Where:** NA server.

**Rioters:**
L4T3NCY
Riot Stephiroth
Ponts
Riot DefaultChar
Riot MoreChrono
Riot Terra

I'll setup custom game rooms and edit the name/pwd into this thread @ 6PM PST. >o</

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Game 01: FULL**
**Name:** ONE FOR ALL challenge 01
**Pwd:** all4one
**Rioters:** L4T3NCY, Riot Stephiroth, Riot MoreChrono, Riot Terra, Riot Defaultchar

Game 02 to come after we wreck these fools first.

There was a bug in Game 01 where our End of Game screen displayed "Defeat". We'll fix it for this time around.

**Game 02: FULL**
**Name:** ONE FOR ALL challenge FINAL
**Pwd:** and1forall
**Rioters:** L4T3NCY, Riot Stephiroth, Riot MoreChrono, Riot Terra, Riot Defaultchar

Today I learned OFA Alistar VS Bard is epic. o.O

GG guys!

replies.body: It would appear that Bard is the only champion available for me to select at this time.

You..

...you're not welcome here...
AD Bard with Rageblade LET'S GO

Why do I keep inviting you guys to these things.... -_-

[#]PlayWithRiot on EUNE when? :D

ARURF against Reds...that'll be the day.
_Just remember, if I accidentally on purpose rolls Lulu, it might be gg for ya'll._ ;)

Sounds fun I'm in. 

The only rioters i've played for trihard in normals (and wreck my squad).

we're the most try hard rioters around, though.

For real.

Really. 

We'll rek u m8

wot
Daym, Savage.
I'm in a game with you right now lmao

Rip the 4v5 :'(

but gg <3 <3 it was fun. Secret: I panic picked MF, and immediately said "Man I hope it doesnt pick this..."

.......

{{champion:21}} {{item:3070}}
Dude, me and my friend picked MF, but one person voted Rengar. The shooting fest would have been funnier ;-;

LOL;

WHAT ARE THE ODDS?

Well now you know... don't do it to yourself :D It's not worth!!

But it was pretty fun :3 so much laughing. If you make it into one of these customs, maybe you can vote for it again XD
we are gona beat u rengo vs mf , so many pinks.

D: NOT AGAIN

I WON'T PANIC VOTE MF THIS TIME
Watched a Darius Bot 1v1 a co-worker in a game just the other day. Darius Bot is so OP.
J4 bot is a penta machine!
im not from na i cry

If i'm not in game I'm in.

Will anyone be streaming it so the people who don't play can watch?
Is there anyone at riot actually good at the game?
I think we have a couple of Master Tier Rioters atm (not sure who?) and various Diamonds.
Great to see some Rioters getting involved with the players personally, thanks for doing this guys!

Not in NA, and not in time. This is sad. Will there be games like this in other regions too? It'd be fun, for all gamemods. This should be a a practise! :D



Btw, I'll just leave this here: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/quahVEEW-teemo-karthus-and-one-for-all-petition
I made them laugh with horrible puns, i feel i truly won at the end of the day
Indeed dude. But always remember that points are life.
plz save a spot for me in gaem 2.

I'd love to join, but if I manage to I'll probably do poorly, but one for all is great.

Last time it was up I had all zyra against all Shaco and it culminated in us hiding in a plant fortress around a vision ward while the Shacos circled menacingly.
Pretty sure it will be first come first serve. Sounds like you just have to watch this post for the lobby name and password
